Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [User] WHERE Username = @Username OR Email = @Email; RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: Insert into [Step]([IdTrip], [Name], [Budget], [Time], [Comments]) Output Inserted.IdStep Values (@IdTrip, @Name, @Budget, @Time, @Comments) RETURN 0
